Text: RE Plan Assumptions with Stan am Cc This is new to me Teb Rob is out on Wed right You might want to call him on the cell Original Message From Lokey Teb Sent Tuesday February AM To Keiser John Schroeder Maggie Howard Kevin A Hayes Robert Cc Lichtenwalter Blair Subject RE Plan Assumptions with Stan am Were we going to meet today to talk about the meeting with Stan Original Message From Keiser John Sent Tuesday February AM To Schroeder Maggie Howard Kevin A Lokey Teb Hayes Robert Cc Lichtenwalter Blair Subject Plan Assumptions with Stan am I talked with Rod about the purpose of the meeting Stan wants to start thinking about the assumptions for the rate case and a ten year Plan I will bring the Plan but it is really a shortterm Plan and Rod does not want me to hand out anything It is a strategy session We assumed in the Plan a rate drop effective I would like to review the assumptions behind that with Teb and Blair to better understand how it was derived This will be one of the major issues for discussion

RE Plan Assumptions with Stan amTeb Horton is having a floor meeting at Does he know Rob is out Stan usually likes a big crowd when he beats us up Original Message From Lokey Teb Sent Tuesday February AM To Hayes Robert Subject RE Plan Assumptions with Stan am Rob is out and I dont know if he isavailable on the cell He is with Alexander in Florida I think we need to meet this pm Original Message From Hayes Robert Sent Tuesday February AM To Lokey Teb Keiser John Schroeder Maggie Howard Kevin A Cc Lichtenwalter Blair Subject RE Plan Assumptions with Stan am This is new to me Teb Rob is out on Wed right You might want to call him on the cell Original Message From Lokey Teb Sent Tuesday February AM To Keiser John Schroeder Maggie Howard Kevin A Hayes Robert Cc Lichtenwalter Blair Subject RE Plan Assumptions with Stan am Were we going to meet today to talk about the meeting with Stan Original Message From Keiser John Sent Tuesday February AM To Schroeder Maggie Howard Kevin A Lokey Teb Hayes Robert Cc Lichtenwalter Blair Subject Plan Assumptions with Stan am I talked with Rod about the purpose of the meeting Stan wants to start thinking about the assumptions for the rate case and a ten year Plan I will bring the Plan but it is really a shortterm Plan and Rod does not want me to hand out anything It is a strategy session We assumed in the Plan a rate drop effective I would like to review the assumptions behind that with Teb and Blair to better understand how it was derived This will be one of the major issues for discussion

REWhos your buddy A little hint wouldnt kill you would it I tell you everything BH Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Wednesday March PM To Hayes Robert Subject Re Sorry to keep you in suspense Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet
Ok now I get it Just keep me in the dark until next week Youre killin me BH

REDont leave me hanging What are you thinking Any TW discussion I always hold our conversations in strict confidence Talk to me Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Wednesday March PM To Hayes Robert Subject RE Yes Stan and I had a good conversation but I will wait until after my vacation next week to make any final decision So please keep our conversation in confidence Original Message From Hayes Robert Sent Wed PM To Corman Shelley Cc Subject Sorry I missed your call Did the meeting go the way you wanted it to Hope so Bob
Sorry I missed your call Did the meeting go the way you wanted it to Hope so Bob
Still avoiding me I think I know whets going onhow much do you know about the IT business Be good Bob
How did the meeting go with Steve Feel any different about it Ill talk to you next week Have a good weekend Bob

REI was just curious I dont want to see you go I too havent spoke to Stan for a week or so Hes looked awful stressed lately Im just trying to stay low and out of his way Ill talk to you later Bob Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Wednesday February PM To Hayes Robert Subject RE I havent visited with Stan lately Why do you ask I know he has a lot going and doesnt have the crystal ball that I and others are looking for Ill try to sit Down with him next week Im not planning on doing anything this week Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

REwhy would theynng guys do that I take it you havent visited with Stan lately Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Wednesday February PM To Hayes Robert Subject RE Yes Of course Im still here I think my NNG friends are spreading the rumor that Im out of here But I just keep busy with my day to day work and try to put of making any decisions Original Message From Hayes Robert Sent Wednesday February PM To Corman Shelley Subject Are you still here Havent seen or heard from you in a couple of days Hope you werent upset at me for digging you about the TV appearance Did you meet with Deb Bob
Are you still here Havent seen or heard from you in a couple of days Hope you werent upset at me for digging you about the TV appearance Did you meet with Deb Bob
Are you watching Kinder Morgan stock this morning Wonder whats going on Bob
